job_title: Human Resources Generalist in London, England
pros: They care for well being and your development.
cons: Nothing major so far. Some things could be  more organised however this is recognised and being worked on positively.

pros: I liked working here. Theres a good vibe and the management of individuals is first class.
cons: Pay is not what it could be. Lunch hours are a joke. Only 10 minutes
